description: A toolkit for connecting to Outlook desktop application to search emails by subject, extract email content and attachments, and send automated replies

capabilities.name: find_and_extract_email
capabilities.description: Find the most recent email matching a subject (case-insensitive contains), extract its content to a text file, download all attachments to a structured folder, and optionally send an automated reply if no attachments are found

subject.description: Email subject to search for (case-insensitive contains match)

output_base_path.description: Base directory path for output files (default: current working directory)

search_unread_only.description: If true, search only unread emails (default: true)

send_reply_if_no_attachments.description: If true, send automated reply email when no attachments are found (default: false)

reply_message.description: Custom reply message template (default: 'Please provide the required attachments for: {subject}')

capabilities.name: check_email_attachments
capabilities.description: Check if an email has any attachments without downloading them

subject.description: Email subject to search for (case-insensitive contains match)

search_unread_only.description: If true, search only unread emails (default: true)

capabilities.name: check_specific_files
capabilities.description: Check if an email contains specific file patterns in its attachments

subject.description: Email subject to search for (case-insensitive contains match)

file_patterns.description: List of file name patterns to search for in attachments (case-insensitive contains match)

search_unread_only.description: If true, search only unread emails (default: true)

capabilities.name: send_email_reply
capabilities.description: Send an email reply via Outlook desktop application

email_account.description: Optional email account to send from (uses default account if not specified)

author: Email Utility Project
